addonManifest.name: Logstash
addonManifest.description: Provides access to a logstash server's configuration by development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: See the readme file (TBD) for detailed notes on the operation and management of this add-on
addonManifest.developerHelp: This add-on creates a logstash index for each instance of the add-on that's provisioned.
addonManifest.author: JvB

property.description: Hostname or IP Address of the logstash server.
Port on which the Logstash Input plugin is listening.

Protocol the Logstatsh Input plugin is expecting. Acceptable values are tcp, udp, http and https. Please note in order to use https, the nodes running this service will have to have a valid certificate chain to validate against the logstash server.
